title: To Make a Greener Building, Start With an Old One
description: Corporations love to show off new constructions with fancy eco features. For truly green architecture, it’s best to build on structures already in place.

title: The Strangely Believable Tale of a Mythical Rogue Drone
description: A widely shared story highlights the need for greater transparency in the development and engineering of AI systems.

title: All the Ways ChatGPT Can Help You Land a Job
description: Whether you use ChatGPT, Bard, or Bing, your favorite AI chatbots can help your application stand out from the crowd.
